column1: This is a list of municipalities in Belgium having standing links to local communities in other countries. In most cases
column3: especially when formalised by local government
column4: is known as "town twinning" (though other terms
column5: such as "partner towns" or "sister cities" are sometimes used instead)
column6: and while most of the places included are towns

column2: GermanyBièvre is a member of the Charter of European Rural Communities
column3: a town twinning association across the European Union

column1: Houffalize is a member of the Douzelage
column2: a town twinning association of towns across the European Union. Houffalize also has two other twin towns.

column1: San Casciano in Val di Pesa
